评论详情: Love the fit of the shirt but it is pilling really bad all over. Have to wear it under something for that reason.
Perfect length. Super comfortable whether with leggings or jean or any occasion. Fits so perfect. I love it and will buy more in other colors.

评论概述: Fabrics are different with different colors
评论详情: I ordered one heather white to see if I’d like it.  It was as described, fit well and seemed good quality.  So I ordered  a black one and a pink one.  They are complete different fabric, although the tags on all three say rayon, cotton and spandex.  I believe that is correct for the white one but the pink one and the black one are definitely something else.  They feel like polyester.  I kept them because of the style and fit but the fabric tags are definitely wrong.

评论详情: I am petite, ordered a size that seemed like it would fit my 5ft 105 frame. XS way too big, not a great fit for me.
Love this comfy workout shirt. It’s flattering and great quality
Great tops. Bought them in 3 colors. The fabric is excellent quality and they wash very well.

Love this top! I wear it at least once a week and it even stretched nicely when I was pregnant. While certainly great for working out, I wear it to work, dressed up with a vest or jacket too. It’s a great, comfortable staple.  The material is soft and a good thickness for comfort in all temperatures. The best value given how frequently I wear it.
Not sure who this was made for but definitely not a normal human. Sleeves were very long - disproportionately so. Nothing fit right. Returned.
Fabric is so soft & cool, holds up well to washing, and I've even worn it tucked into a skirt to work. Comfy, stretchy, Perfect dark chocolate brown. I want every color.

评论概述: I’m getting this in every color
评论详情: Love this top. I’m 5’8”, 140 lbs and I like the small, go for up a size for a baggier fit. Great fabric.
Cute cut, cute style BUT thin material. I ordered the light blue and it's as bad "see-through" as white. Returning and ordering darker colors ONLY.
These tops are just ok. The material is thin. I bought them to sleep in, so I kept them. I would not have otherwise.
No cotton in this shirt!
I am so comfortable using this shirt for my Pilates Classes. It’s lightweight and doesn’t get in my way. It also keeps me warm since it’s winter time

Really like this top! Not clingy and the curved hem is flattering. I usually wear a large but sized down to a medium based on measurements and how huge it looks in some of the pictures. Turned out to be a perfect fit and length. Bought multiple colors !

评论概述: Very Nice Top for Someone Tall
评论详情: This is probably a perfect top for someone that is TALL and RULER shaped. I am 5'3", 120 pounds, hour-glass shape. However, it was a very pretty color in pink and appeared well made. If I was tall and ruler shaped, I would give it 5 stars.

评论概述: Best and most affordable workout LS top out there
评论详情: I've purchased this top in 3 different colors, because it looks and feels so great with thumbholes, too.  These tops come in a super array of colors.  Absolutely love for gym and home.  Can't go wrong!  Easy wash, no wrinkles, nice details with across the back seam.  Recommend highly!  Stretchy and comfy.

I wrote an in depth review for the short sleeve version so I'll just summarize: The white is decently opaque, especially with a nude bra. Fabric is structured with some stretch but still lightweight and doesn't cling, and feels like it will hold shape. Fit isn't too boxy but I do have wider hips so the L fit better on my hips but the M fit better on my bust and waist, and the length hit right at my hip bones. Sleeve length was perfect for me and my height is more in my arms and legs than trunk so it is tall girl friendly if you have long limbs. I will definitely be stocking up in my staple colors and I'll be going with the size M

This was my first piece from this brand & now I have many more. The quality is of a high end brand without paying the high end price. This particular top is lightweight, breathable and flattering. Very functional for any activity. Dont pass on this brand.
Very comfortable; I like the fabric blend. Fits true to size.

I like the fit of this top. It's not too tight or compression so it's more flexible and comfortable. The quality is nice as well. I've ordered The Gym People leggings before and been happy with those, so I decided to try this shirt. Liked it well enough I bought it in another color.
I Love to wear this Shirt Because it fits well and I look good in this Shirt!  It is not expensive and wears Well.I Can dress it up or wear casually With Jeans.

评论概述: I like it. Fit is great

So soft and well stitched. Wish there were even more colors to chose from but not complaining as it fits well, true to size. Update: looks like more colors added!
Very nice shirt, fast shipping and fair price., very soft, love the color and fit was good

Theses are so very soft and the fit is perfect ! I bought several colors

The gym people products are amazing. Every top long or short sleeve is superb quality. I recommend them to everyone.

I have tried so many workout shirts that have fallen short, this one is exactly what I have been wishing for. The cut (rounded hem, nice detail on upper back), quality stitching, fabric feel and thickness (not see-through). Washes up nicely. Will be sticking with this shirt for my workout clothes.
Really nice cooling and breathable material. Very stretchy and comfortable, and was long enough to cover. The thumb holes were nice, and fit nicely.

Love this shirt ... It looks and feels so good! I was experiencing sunburns through my super expensive trendy walking gear. So I researched and came across this brand and it's MADE IN THE USA. Received the shirt and have since ordered 2 more. No more sunburns while walking or running errands.  And it's heck of cute 👍
I was looking for a sun shirt that wasn’t shiny but still stretchy. Perfect thickness, weight, and quality.

I love this material. It is incredibly soft and well made. It’s nice and thick but also lightweight. It feels like quality material. The only gripe I have is that it’s a little see through but also white is see through. It’s not a deal breaker for me.

So soft and comfortable. Fit was perfect and I was very pleased.

I’ve been on a search for a shirt to wear while out walking that is comfortable and breathes easily while still providing coverage for sun exposure. I’ve ordered expensive brands and had to return them for not hanging right, being to clinging, too tight, too long etc. These tops are my favorite. They are very comfortable. I like the feel of the fabric, due to the cotton content. I have 5 of them now. That’s hi ow much i like them. They are light weight without being see through (even the white one. For me it’s a flattering fit, not boxy but not tight. Perfect for airflow to allow them to feel cooler than most of my other t-shirts. The price point is an added bonus.
Love this shirt as it is the perfect weight and not see through. I have ordered in multiple colors!
This is really nice! I'm sick of all polyester workout tops and this one feels soft. I have several!
But it runs a little small 😔
Great shirt. I use it for work and working out. The material is soft, the fit is great

Exactly as described. Fit true to size.
My grand daughter loved it, she used it to cover up her tattoos on her arm

I am really happy with this shirt! I am 5'4 and 120 lbs. Bought a small and it was a perfect fit. Totally breathable, not clingy, a little see thru, but was perfect for my Pilates class. Plan to buy a couple different colors. YAY!
When I opened it, there were stains all over it
One of my go to staple shirts for comfort with some ahh leisure style!
Fits great the the navy blue

This top is one of my favorites -I wear it all the time! You can dress it up or down & the fit is great, very true to size! My only down fall is that the white is a bit sheer & i have to wear a tank under it, but the fabric is so light that it doesn't bother me! Overall very happy :)
I got a small,very loose, sleeves go below hands, sleeves baggy, too long. Soft material
Going to buy more!! Love the material, fit!  Sleeves are long but are suppose to be long. Sized up and doesn’t cling. A little  longer so will be nice  to wear with leggings!!!

comfortable when playing sports

Love this shirt. Fits true. Good shirt for under things
Love the feel, the thumb holes, and that it’s not cropped! Purchased a couple of colors.

Basic under layer. Fit well, washes, and wears well. Nice price point.

评论概述: Work out shirt did not work out for me
评论详情: Was not a fan of the fabric or the cut of the shirt. Sleeve length was good, but was too wide throughout the body.

评论概述: Doesn’t feel cheap, but wears like it is
评论详情: I was impressed with the feel of this top when I took it out of the bag. It feels like a much nicer quality fabric than I would expect here, for the price. However, after one wash (delicate cycle, laid flat to dry) and two wears it is already pilling under the arms. That is just not acceptable, this is not meant to last. I’m very disappointed. The cut and fit of the shirt are great, and I love the feel of the fabric. Sadly, it just won’t last.

I like these shirts because they’re soft, true to size, and I love any top with thumb holes, but unfortunately both of mine got holes in them after only 3 wears. I figured the first was just a coincidence, so I ordered a second in a different color and began washing them on the lightest setting. Alas, I noticed a hole on my second shirt the third time I wore it. So, if you’re looking for good quality, this is not your shirt. Though all other items I’ve ordered from them (shorts and joggers) are fantastic!
It fit’s perfectly
Nice material, runs big

I wanted to like this shirt but like the other reviews said it’s short, if you have a lil stomach and want a shirt that won’t lift up when working out this is not it. The material is great but had it been a tad bit longer it would’ve been a great shirt I would’ve ordered more but no.
Was a little big so I’m ordering a size smaller. I love it and will still wear it.
I need to buy a second one because of how much I love this shirt.
Great shirt

I am keeping this top, but it runs very large....at least a size maybe two sizes bigger than I expected for a performance tee. The sleeves also run very long and looks ridiculous when trying to use thumb holes. Why am I keeping? I will wear it over another tee and top with a vest when I go for a run on colder days.  I would not buy again and I would not recommend buying unless you have very long arms and like very loose, ill fitting tees.

I LOVE this shirt! Bought 6 in various colors. It is generously sized and heavy enough to be worn without undershirt even in white. The fabric is substantial without being hot or heavy. I also have many of the yoga tanks by the same company and I have to mention that the long sleeve shirts run much larger than the sleeveless yoga tanks. In this long sleeve, I would size down if in doubt .. they are generously cut all over. Not that I am 5'1" and I love both the yoga tank by The Gym People and this long sleeve tank because they are short enough for me, hitting just a bit below the waist. They might be too short for taller women.

This is a nice midweight layering shirt. The fit is a little big probably should’ve ordered a size smaller than my actual size to wear under my more fitted shirts. Texture is nice and comfortable. I will get a lot of wear out of this shirt
Great shirt, awesome fabric and comfortable.  In my experience, it runs really large.  I was hoping for a tighter fit, size down.

This is a basic loose fitting top that is well made and comfortable. It is a good piece for layering. Holds up to washing and comes out of the dryer wrinkle free. I think it is a good foundation piece for gym goers.

The Gym People Top is soooooooo pretty. I absolutely love the pink color. Bright buy not neon - perfect. Sleeves are a long length enough to fully cover my arms with no extra hanging over my hands. Neckline is cut well for coverage of upper chest (not wide cut). Legth comes to about my lower waist I'm 5'3" 3/4" and 160 lbs. Fabric moves all over, stretches a over, is very light weight but not see through in the pink color. My last photo is my hand under one layer of fabric. Fits true to sizing.

评论用户: Cooooobra La La La La La La La La La La La La
评论概述: Great material, soft, fit perfect after wash/dry, but a bit too short
评论详情: Alrighty fine folks of Amazon! I've got a review of this great shirt for you below!  Body information: 5’4” 190-199 lbs  Material: The fabric is very soft and the material thickness is perfect. I love that there are no itchy tags to bother you!  Features: Love the added thumb hole in the sleeves to help keep the sleeves down and secure.  Fit: On arrival the shirt sleeves were a couple inches too long but the shirt shrunk some after I washed and dried it which resulted in a great fit! The sleeves were the perfect length after washing/drying! However, and the reason for the removal of 1 star, the torso is very short. If I’m wearing high waisted leggings it just barely covers the top of the leggings on the sides. If it was normal rise leggings, your skin would show. Especially on your sides because of the swoop up detail in the shirt at the sides.  Overall, nice quality shirt, but I really wish the torso of the shirt was longer. Would highly recommend if that’s not something that bothers you!

This isn't cropped, but definitely does not go down as far as I would like to it to go, and I'm only 5'3". I'm usually between and small and medium in women's clothes, but mostly a medium in athletic wear. I got this in a medium and it is too baggy for my liking. I would be worried about going down to a small for length, though. The materal feels nice and is a soft, wicking material. The light blue color is true to the photos and is really pretty in person. The fit just isn't my favorite or preferred proportions.

I got the THE GYM PEOPLE Women's Long Sleeve Workout Shirts Athletic Crewneck Hiking Tops with Thumb Hole in Pink, Large. I would pay attention to the size chart in the images because this shirt is larger than most brands. My main issue with fit is that the sleeves are a bit long. Yes, they're supposed to go over my hands, but I have a few extra inches beyond that.  The pink is pretty and even though the color is pale, the shirt isn't see through. The fabric is lightweight and nice for working out.  I wouldn't wear this top for anything but working out, but I do like that it is a workout shirt available in a pretty color and not just utilitarian colors.

While the fabric wasn't as soft as I'd hoped, and the arm seam is a bit annoyingly thick, it's a decent purchase for the price point. Obviously, it's not Lululemon quality, but you get what you pay for. On a positive note, the pink hue is pleasantly subdued. The design is straightforward, and the neckline is flawlessly executed. The fit is slightly spacious, and the sleeves run a bit long; despite ordering a small, it feels more like a medium.

No need to size up to get a comfortable, relaxed fit on this one. If anything, this top runs a little on the large side, depending on whether you like tight or loose. I ordered the XL and it's a comfortable, slightly loose fit, without being oversized or sloppy. The sleeve length and overall top length are both great for me at 5'5". The fabric is soft and light but not at all see-through. Very nice quality.

My wife looooves this top. She’s 5’2”, 116lbs, and ordered a small. It fits great. My wife likes the darts on the back to give shape. She also loves the thumb loops, the color, how soft the top is, how moisture wicking. Five out of five.

When I first pulled this out of the package I was a little disappointed because I thought it would be softer with the cotton content. It feels a wee bit more synthetic than imagined. Some may like this because it is a workout shirt after all. That being said, I absolutely love the fit. It does feel good once on. It’s fitted on me without being super tight, it skims but looks nice, not sloppy. For reference. I followed the size chart. I’m normally a size 10 or a medium in most standard brands like Loft, Banana, etc (5’6”-145-38D) I ordered the medium.

This top is everything I expected. I'm 5'6" and 202lbs. I normally wear an XL or 16/18. I bought a XL in this and it fit and was a bit loose.  The material is not too thin and not too thick. Good material for the fall. It is the type of material that you find in exercise clothes. I probably use it to wear for walks outside when it gets cooler. My favorite part of the shirt is the thumbholes.

I was a bit skeptical ordering this online however, the size fits perfect and it’s nice in flowy… It’s extremely soft and it lands below the waist so it doesn’t feel like it is a crop top. Love the color, it is exactly as pictured and fits as suggested.

I really like the softness of the fabric on this shirt, and the thumb holes are kind of a necessity for me as I’ve been using sun shirts to play pickleball. The cut of the shirt is baggier than I would like though. I guess it’s common for this type of shirt to be baggy, but I do prefer a bit more fitted shirt.

The THE GYM PEOPLE Workout Top is my wife's new favorite. It's super comfortable and feels and looks great. It has breathable material that keeps my wife cool throughout her workout. The thumb holes are an extra bonus and add protection while training though you can also just push the sleeves up and workout without them.  My wife is 5'5, 36D (size M-L) and she got the XL for a looser fit--it's true to size if you want a tighter fit. She loves how it drapes over her form. It's flattering and fun to wear. It's machine washable and hang dries quickly. Overall, this is a winner and highly recommended.  ~ Kort
I will buy a smaller size as xl came too big .
Très confortable.

I am not sure about the material... it's thinner than I expected. I like the way it's fits. I'm 5'5 125lbs and medium works great for me...not tight I love that part. It's just the material is different. I love their hoodies so much. I was going to buy some gym people shirts but if they are the same material I might not.
Love this shirt! For me I sized down one for a better fit. Perfect length and the material is soft. It may be a little warm for sports in the summer but great for this time of year.
Auf dem Foto sieht das Shirt sehr eng geschnitten aus. Habe es deswegen eine Nummee größer bestellt. Ist jedoch viel zu groß und geht zurück.
Fits great, love the feel.
Material is good quality
What a nice surprise!! Lovely fabric and great with getting blueberry stains out! Lovely cut so I went and bought another set!
